alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Northern Wayne; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 6:29AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHEMUNG...TIOGA... BROOME...SULLIVAN...DELAWARE...SUSQUEHANNA...NORTHERN WAYNE...AND BRADFORD COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. A quick 1 to 2 inches of snow could fall with this snow band. This will lead to untreated surfaces becoming snow covered and slippery. Use caution and plan some extra time to reach your destination this morning. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 627 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Roxbury to near Downsville to near Sherman to Brackney to near Sylvania and moving east at 35 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Rockland, Chemung, Binghamton, Vestal, Johnson City, Endicott, Southport, Barton, Kirkwood, and Sayre. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 3. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 59 and 69, and between 75 and 97. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 217 and 230. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
